sentences.english: He was rated as one of '1986 Shanghai People in Cultural News'.
sentences.chinese: 被評爲1986年度上海文化新聞人物。

sentences.english: I had my fifteen minutes of news-fame.
sentences.chinese: 我也一度曾算新聞人物，有料。

sentences.english: The president became a newsmaker because of his love affairs.
sentences.chinese: 總統因感情問題而成爲新聞人物。

sentences.english: The Frenchman has been back-page news this week after comments attributed to him about Real Madrid.
sentences.chinese: 在迴應了皇馬的傳聞後，法國人成了本週的新聞人物。

sentences.english: The entrepreneur has become a news figure.
sentences.chinese: 這位企業家變成了新聞人物。

definition: see 呂洞賓|吕洞宾[Lu:3 Dong4 bin1]
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
Classic of Rites (same as 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4])
Shen Yue (441-513), writer and historian during Liang of Southern dynasties 南朝梁, compiler of History of Song of the Southern dynasties 宋書|宋书
old variant of 補缺|补缺[bu3 que1]
Yang Zhu (c. 440-360 BC), Chinese philosopher advocating ethical egoism
Zhang Juzheng (1525-1582), Grand Secretary during the Ming dynasty, credited with bringing the dynasty to its apogee
